existing_features.title: Create a member registration form that collects full name, email address, phone number, and membership type
Display success confirmation message with member ID after successful registration submission
Create an admin view to list all registered members with their details in a table format
Design a professional and modern visual theme with a cohesive color palette (avoiding blue and purple), clean typography, and organized layout that reflects a formal membership organization aesthetic

Modify the registration form to support dynamic form fields that will be defined by an uploaded form structure, allowing the registration process to accommodate custom fields beyond the current fullName, email, phoneNumber, and membershipType
Create an admin interface to upload and configure the registration form structure, allowing administrators to define custom fields, field types, validation rules, and labels in Malay language

new_feature_requests.summary: Create member registration website for PESRON
Implement backend data model and storage for PESRON member records with fields: id, fullName, email, phoneNumber, membershipType, registrationDate, and status
Create backend method to submit new member registrations and return confirmation with member ID
Create backend query method to retrieve all member registrations for admin display
Enable online registration using form that will be uploaded later

Update the backend data model to store flexible member registration data that accommodates custom fields defined in the uploaded form structure, while maintaining backward compatibility with existing member records

Preserve the existing registration form layout and structure, ensuring all current form fields (full name, email, phone number, membership type, and dynamic custom fields) remain in their current visual arrangement and styling
